Package cscd212classes.observable

Class AwesomeDeals

java.lang.Object
cscd212classes.observable.AwesomeDeals
public class AwesomeDeals extends Object
This is the class being observed, AKA this is the observable class All parameters will be passed as final

    Field

    private String
    daily
    This data member represents the daily deal

    hourly

    private PropertyChangeSupport
    support
    This is the property change support that keeps track of who is observing this class

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AwesomeDeals()
    The default value constructor that sets daily to Daily Deal and hourly to Hourly Deal.

  • Field Details

    • hourly

      private String hourly
      This data member represents the hourly deal

    • daily

      private String daily
      This data member represents the daily deal

    • support

      private PropertyChangeSupport support
      This is the property change support that keeps track of who is observing this class

  • Constructor Details

    • AwesomeDeals

      public AwesomeDeals()
      The default value constructor that sets daily to Daily Deal and hourly to Hourly Deal. It also creates a property change support for this class.

  • Method Details

    • subscribeDaily

      public void subscribeDaily()
      The subscribeDaily method allows an observer to subscribe to the daily deals. This method fires a property change event with Subscribed Daily, null and the value in this daily data member

    • subscribeHourly

      public void subscribeHourly()
      The subscribeHour method allows an observer to subscribe to the hour deals. This method fires a property change event with Subscribed Hourly, null and the value in this hourly data member

    • changeDaily

      public void changeDaily(String daily)
      The changeDaily method how the daily deals are changed. This method saves the old daily deal, updates the daily class level data member to the new daily deal, and finally it calls the fire property change passing New Daily the old and new values
      Parameters:
      daily - Representing the new daily deal

    • changeHourly

      public void changeHourly(String hourly)
      The changeHourly method how the hourly deals are changed. This method saves the old hourly deal, updates the hourly class level data member to the new hourly deal, and finally it calls the fire property change passing New Hourly the old and new values
      Parameters:
      hourly - Representing the new hourly deal

    • getHourly

      public String getHourly()
      The getHourly method returns the class level value for hourly
      Returns:
      String Representing the class level value for hourly

    • getDaily

      public String getDaily()
      The getDaily method returns the class level value for daily
      Returns:
      String Representing the class level value for daily

    • addPropertyChangeListener

      public void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener pcl)
      The addPropertyChangeListener adds to the support class level variable. This is what actually adds the observer so it can be notified of property changes
      Parameters:
      pcl - Representing the listener to be added to the list of observers

    • removePropertyChangeListener

      public void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener pcl)
      The removePropertyChangeListener removes from the support class level variable. This is what actually removes the observer so it will no longer be notified of property changes
      Parameters:
      pcl - Representing the listener to be removed to the list of observers
